data.lyric:
[ti:Good Guy (Explicit)]
[ar:Eminem/Jessie Reyez]
[al:Kamikaze]
[by:]
[offset:0]
[00:00.01]Good Guy (Explicit) - Eminem/Jessie Reyez
[00:00.02]Producer：illadaproducer/Eminem
[00:00.03]Eminem：
[00:00.22]Here we go again from heroes to villains
[00:03.47]Used to be your Romeo but we both were jilted
[00:06.24]A couple of times so we had a slippery slope to deal with
[00:09.51]But still it gave me hope that we'll get
[00:12.45]Through it together a severed earlobe
[00:14.47]Mailed to you in an E-N-V-E-lope would be dope
[00:16.87]But what kind of lengths can you go
[00:18.71]Pull a Vincent van Gogh just to convince a d**n ho
[00:22.00]To be a housewife who outright lies
[00:23.91]She's blackout drunk now she's backin' out my drive
[00:26.54]I ran outside why is she tryna act out
[00:28.86]She's just about my size hit me in the mouth twice
[00:31.52]Guys when someone you'd die for
[00:33.26]Sticks a steak knife in your heart do you try more
[00:36.05]Another late night in she stumbles through my door
[00:38.74]Lets the daylight in and all we do is fight more
[00:41.63]And I ain't violent but she's goin' through my drawers
[00:44.05]To plant the K-Y in I'm gettin' accused by a whore
[00:46.60]Who smells like St. Ides and who's prob'ly screwed five more
[00:49.19]Guys sucked eight/nine men
[00:50.56]I'm takin' two-by-fours to our eight-by-tens
[00:53.39]B**ch it's you I tore out the frame I win
[00:56.00]Put up a new high score beat this game I'm in
[00:58.65]And here's some two-ply for when you date my friends
[01:01.31]In order to wipe your a** when you moved your bowels
[01:03.92]When we renewed our vows this the thanks I get
[01:06.53]I'm waitin' for the day I can
[01:08.20]Hear you say
[01:08.70]Marshall what a skank I've been
[01:10.57]And there's a new guy you're being replaced by him
[01:13.37]Got your tubes tied for him got that boob job for him
[01:16.10]Hurts me to my core but the pain I'm in
[01:18.67]After you I swore to make the gray skies end
[01:21.34]Here come the rays like when you get a pay hike and
[01:24.00]Am I the good guy or do I just play like him
[01:26.62]And hope that he dumps you
[01:27.93]It's like a dream come true just to scream f**k you
[01:30.76]Guess you take life in the same way you play dice then
[01:33.31]'Cause you just look at me and roll them little snake eyes in
[01:36.06]Since
[01:36.21]Jessie Reyez：
[01:36.49]Since you bought the jury they'll call me guilty
[01:40.26]They'll call me guilty
[01:41.83]You bought the jury they'll call me guilty
[01:45.06]Even though you know the real me
[01:47.01]You can't beat a cheater convince a nonbeliever
[01:49.72]And I ain't in my feelings I'm out
[01:51.50]But I'll let you say that you're the good guy
[01:57.49]'Cause this ain't what love looks like
[02:03.01]You can't beat a cheater convince a nonbeliever
[02:05.78]I ain't in my feelings I'm out
[02:07.38]But I'll let you say that you're the good guy
[02:13.93]Play like you're the good guy
[02:17.12]Play like play like play like you're the good guy
data.trans:
[ti:Good Guy (Explicit)]
[ar:Eminem/Jessie Reyez]
[al:Kamikaze]
[by:]
[offset:0]
[00:00.01]//
[00:00.02]//
[00:00.03]//
[00:00.22]往事重现 英雄变成大反派
[00:03.47]从前我是你的罗密欧 但我们终究抛弃了彼此
[00:06.24]反复纠缠 我们的关系急剧恶化
[00:09.51]但我依然心怀希望 说不定我们可以
[00:12.45]携手共渡难关 割掉一只耳朵
[00:14.47]邮寄到你家 真是酷毙了
[00:16.87]但是你的爱能持续多久
[00:18.71]我像梵高一样掏心掏肺 你却变得
[00:22.00]像个满嘴谎言的家庭主妇
[00:23.91]她烂醉如泥 现在她就要离开
[00:26.54]我冲了出去 为什么她要那样故作姿态
[00:28.86]她跟我的体型相仿 两记重拳打在我脸上
[00:31.52]各位 要是你最信任的人
[00:33.26]在你心口插一把刀 你还会为他赴汤蹈火吗
[00:36.05]有天凌晨 她蹒跚打开我家门
[00:38.74]晨光照射进来 我们却争吵得越发激烈
[00:41.63]我不喜欢暴力 但她翻我的抽屉
[00:44.05]塞进了一瓶K-Y 指控说我出轨
[00:46.60]她自己一身酒气 说不定还偷了五个男人
[00:49.19]各位 她和八九个男人有染
[00:50.56]我们的照片挂在墙上 我要统统毁掉
[00:53.39]臭女人 我撕掉了你的照片 我赢了
[00:56.00]找个更漂亮的女人 这场游戏我完胜
[00:58.65]给你一点卫生纸 当你勾搭我朋友时
[01:01.31]留下一堆烂摊子 可以用它擦屁股
[01:03.92]我们再续誓言 这就是你对我的感谢吗
[01:06.53]我期待有一天 可以
[01:08.20]听你说
[01:08.70]马歇尔 我真是个不要脸的女人
[01:10.57]我遇见了一个男人 代替了你的位置
[01:13.37]你为他结扎 你为他隆胸
[01:16.10]我痛彻心扉 但我别无选择 只能承受
[01:18.67]从此以后 我发誓 一定要结束这暗无天日的生活
[01:21.34]阳光普照 开开心心 就像获得了升职加薪
[01:24.00]我是好男人吗 或者说我装作是个好男人
[01:26.62]实际上希望他甩了你
[01:27.93]仿佛梦想成了真 大声骂出来 去你的
[01:30.76]看来你的生活就像玩骰子
[01:33.31]你看着我 掷下骰子 两个一点 说明我不是你的真命天子
[01:36.06]因为
[01:36.21]//
[01:36.49]因为你买通了陪审团 他们会说我有罪
[01:40.26]他们会说我有罪
[01:41.83]你买通了陪审团 他们会说我有罪
[01:45.06]你明明了解真实的我
[01:47.01]你无法击败骗子 无法说服没信仰的人
[01:49.72]反正我也没那么矫情 我退出
[01:51.50]但是如果你自诩是个好男人 那就是吧
[01:57.49]这不是真爱的模样
[02:03.01]你无法击败骗子 无法说服没信仰的人
[02:05.78]反正我也没那么矫情 我退出
[02:07.38]但是如果你自诩是个好男人 那就是吧
[02:13.93]假装你是好男人
[02:17.12]假装 假装 假装你是好男人
